Class ApplicationProjectStatusDAO

java.lang.Object
BTOManagementSystem.Model.DAO.ApplicationProjectStatusDAO
public class ApplicationProjectStatusDAO extends Object
DAO class that manages application records for applicants applying to BTO projects.

Handles reading from and writing to the ApplicantProjectStatus CSV file. Supports CRUD operations on application statuses, and filters for use by HDB officers and managers.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ApplicationProjectStatusDAO()
    Constructs the DAO and initializes application records from the CSV file.

    • ApplicationProjectStatusDAO

      public ApplicationProjectStatusDAO()
      Constructs the DAO and initializes application records from the CSV file.

  • Method Details

    • reloadFromFile

      public void reloadFromFile()
      Reloads the in-memory list of applications from the CSV file.

    • LoadAllApplicantProjectStatuses

      public void LoadAllApplicantProjectStatuses()
      Loads all application records from the CSV file into memory.

    • applyForProject

      public boolean applyForProject(User user, String projectName, FlatType flatType)
      Attempts to apply a user to a project with a given flat type.
      Parameters:
      user - the user applying
      projectName - the name of the project
      flatType - the desired flat type
      Returns:
      true if application is successful, false if already applied or previously rejected

    • getApplicationStatus

      public ApplicationStatus getApplicationStatus(String applicantNRIC, String projectName, FlatType flatType)
      Gets the application status of a user for a specific project and flat type.
      Parameters:
      applicantNRIC - the NRIC of the applicant
      projectName - the name of the project
      flatType - the flat type
      Returns:
      the current ApplicationStatus, or null if not found

    • getProjectNameforApplicant

      public String getProjectNameforApplicant(User user)
      Retrieves the project name associated with the user's application.
      Parameters:
      user - the user whose project name is to be fetched
      Returns:
      project name if found, null otherwise

    • getApplicationsByNRIC

      public List<ApplicantProjectStatus> getApplicationsByNRIC(String applicantNRIC)
      Retrieves all applications made by a user.
      Parameters:
      applicantNRIC - the NRIC of the applicant
      Returns:
      a list of ApplicantProjectStatus entries

    • getApplications

      public List<ApplicantProjectStatus> getApplications()
      Retrieves the full list of application records.
      Returns:
      list of all ApplicantProjectStatus

    • getAnApplication

      public ApplicantProjectStatus getAnApplication(String applicantNRIC, String projectName)
      Gets a specific application record based on applicant NRIC and project name.
      Parameters:
      applicantNRIC - the NRIC of the applicant
      projectName - the project name
      Returns:
      the matching ApplicantProjectStatus, or null if not found

    • updateApplicationStatus

      public boolean updateApplicationStatus(String applicantNRIC)
      Updates an application's status to BOOKED if it is currently SUCCESSFUL.
      Parameters:
      applicantNRIC - the NRIC of the applicant
      Returns:
      true if status was updated, false otherwise

    • updateDB

      public boolean updateDB()
      Persists the project application list to the CSV file.
      Returns:
      true if the update succeeded, false if an error occurred

    • mark_unsuccessful

      public void mark_unsuccessful(String nric, String projectName)
      Marks an application as UNSUCCESSFUL for the given applicant and project.
      Parameters:
      nric - the NRIC of the applicant
      projectName - the name of the project

    • mark_successful

      public int mark_successful(String nric, String projectName)
      Marks an application as SUCCESSFUL for the given applicant and project.
      Parameters:
      nric - the NRIC of the applicant
      projectName - the name of the project
      Returns:
      1 if successful, 0 if not found

    • LoadApplications

      public ArrayList<ApplicantProjectStatus> LoadApplications(String[] FilterData)
      Loads and filters application records based on filter data.
      Parameters:
      FilterData - an array containing [projectName, ageRange, status]
      Returns:
      a list of applications matching the given filters
